entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY, HOT WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
HIGHEST HEAT INDEX READINGS HEAT INDEX READINGS UP TO 107 IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR

HOT

SUNNY
